mapper.sql: ID, DEVICE_ID, GATEWAY_ID, REQUEST_ID, SERVICE_ID, SERVICE_TYPE, EVENT_TIME, METER_TYPE, METER_ADDR, FACTORY_CODE, CTRL_CODE, DATA_DI, METER_SEQUENCE, METER_DATA_TYPE, METER_DATA, METER_DATA_BASIC, METER_CHECKSUM, JSON_DATA, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WM_METER ( DEVICE_ID, GATEWAY_ID, REQUEST_ID, SERVICE_ID, SERVICE_TYPE, EVENT_TIME, METER_TYPE, METER_ADDR, FACTORY_CODE, CTRL_CODE, DATA_DI, METER_SEQUENCE, METER_DATA_TYPE, METER_DATA, METER_DATA_BASIC, METER_CHECKSUM, JSON_DATA, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME ) VALUES ( ( SELECT ID FROM WM_DEVICE WHERE DEVICE_ID = #{deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ), #{gatewayId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{requestId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serviceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eventTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{meterType,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{meterAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{factoryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ctrlCode,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{dataDI,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sequence,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{dataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{data,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataBasic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checksum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{jsonData,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE )
mapper.update: update wm_meter set DEVICE_ID = #{deviceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, GATEWAY_ID = #{gatewayId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REQUEST_ID = #{requestId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SERVICE_ID = #{serviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SERVICE_TYPE = #{serviceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EVENT_TIME = #{eventTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, METER_TYPE = #{meterType,jdbcType=BIGINT}, METER_ADDR = #{meterAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FACTORY_CODE = #{factoryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CTRL_CODE = #{ctrlCode,jdbcType=BIGINT}, DATA_DI = #{dataDI,jdbcType=BIGINT}, METER_SEQUENCE = #{sequence,jdbcType=BIGINT}, METER_DATA_TYPE = #{dataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, METER_DATA = #{data,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, METER_DATA_BASIC = #{dataBasic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, METER_CHECKSUM = #{checksum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, JSON_DATA = #{jsonData,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME = SYSDATE where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM WM_METER ORDER BY ID DESC
